56.question: Who proposed marriage first, you or your wife?

57.question: What animal does your mother-in-law remind you of?

58.question: Where did you first kiss your wife?

59.question: What color dress did your wife wear on your first date?

60.question: What item of clothing would you like to see your wife eliminate from her wardrobe? (item and color)

61.question: What color are your wife's eyes?

62.question: Where will your wife say she had the best vacation with you?

63.question: What flower best describes your wife in the morning when she first gets up?

64.question: Which one of your habits would your wife like to break?

65.question: Who caught the garter at your wedding?

66.question: Where did you first meet your wife?

67.question: What traffic sign best describes your wife on a bad day?

68.question: Before I was married I always used to ________, but now I ________.

69.question: What television show did you and your wife watch together last?

70.question: What size ring does your wife wear?

71.question: Name your wife's last two boy friends.

72.question: What is your wife's pet name for you?

73.question: What did your wife pay for the most expensive dress she has bought since you have been married?

74.question: How long will your wife say she can go without a mirror?

75.question: At what specific sport or game will your wife say she is definitely better than you?

76.question: Using one descriptive word that begins with the first initial of your last name, how will your wife describe you on your first date together?

77.question: What word does your wife use most often when she is upset?

78.question: If you gave your wife $10, what would she buy?

79.question: How many pairs of shoes does your wife own?

80.question: What color are the sheets on your bed?

81.question: What was the last item your wife bought that you did not like?

82.question: What movie star will your wife say she is most like?

83.question: If your wife had her choice, where would she most like to live?

84.question: What dance would your wife use to describe your marriage?

85.question: How will your wife complete this sentence? My husband has more ________ than anyone else I know.

86.question: Where will your wife say was the very last place she heard you break into a song solo?

87.question: How will your wife describe you when you wake up in the morning? Will she say you are?

88.question: What would your wife tell people her exact dress size is?

89.question: In two words, how will your wife describe her exact feeling after your honeymoon?

90.question: On a one to ten scale, where will your wife rate your overall impact on women if ten is James Bond himself?

91.question: What will your wife say is the one home appliance the two of you need the most?

92.question: What will your wife say is the very first gift she gave you?

93.question: Where, specifically, will your wife say the two of you went on your very first date together?

94.question: What will your wife say is the single most unusual thing she has in her purse?

95.question: How will your wife complete this sentence: "My husband always puts his foot in his mouth when he starts talking about..." (what?)

96.question: What is the title of your wife's favorite record album/CD?

97.question: What is your wife's favorite kind of cake?

98.question: If mattel modeled a doll after your wife, what phrase will she admit is most likely to come out of her mouth when you pull the string on her back?

99.question: In order of easiest to hardest, what could your wife give up cold turkey for one entire month?

100.question: Will your wife say that total strangers are more surprised that she married you or that you married her?

101.question: How much will your wife say her brain weighs in ounces?

102.question: What secret will your wife say that you, personally, have learned most recently about all women?

103.question: Besides the bathroom, what is the one thing your wife wishes the two if you didn't share?

104.question: What was the last thing you did that made her give you the evil eye?

105.question: What is your wife's all-time favorite movie?

106.question: What is the first activity or thing that your wife does when she wakes up in the morning?

107.question: What qualities does your wife like or admire the most about you?

108.question: What habit of your wife's irritates you the most?

109.question: What is your wife most scared of?

110.question: Who wears the pants in your family?
